dc_title_s: CDFI (Community Development Financial Institutions) Fund Priority Points
dc_description_s: The Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFI) Fund, a division of the US Department of the Treasury, is now using a priority point system for scoring its applications. Applicants are awarded up to 5 “priority points“for their commitment to serve communities facing the highest levels of distress.The score is tabulated using various distress indicators, which are also mapped on PolicyMap. These indicators are: poverty rates, median household income, unemployment rates, home foreclosures and high-cost mortgages.
dc_subject_sm: Cdfi Fund Applications And Priority Point Scoring System
